title: Neeko Music
body:
Whatever else you may think of Neeko... that music is spot on. Props are deserved for that music.

Gotta see if Riot's offering a download for it when I get home lol...

replies.body:
Hey Eleshakai!

Thanks for your kind words, had a blast writing music for her!

Music should be available for download sometime in the next 48hrs.
Thank you so much for the reply! I look forward to acquiring it then. Where would be the best place to look for it, when it's available??

> [{quoted}](name=Eleshakai,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=FVzbfjf5,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-06T01:58:07.518+0000)
>
> Thank you so much for the reply! I look forward to acquiring it then. Where would be the best place to look for it, when it's available??

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/neeko-the-curious-chameleon](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/neeko-the-curious-chameleon)
I now know the first thing I'm doing tonight when I get home from work.
